description:
Guitar Hub is an open-source guitar scale application for PCs that run Windows.

## Features

- Guitar fretboard
- Scales in various keys
- Change mode
- Toggle note name or interval name
- Flip neck
- Left-handed fretboard
- Toggle intervals

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fredimachado/GuitarHub/master/assets/screenshot.gif)
summary: Guitar Hub is an open-source guitar application app for PCs that run Windows.
author: Fredi Machado
